Title: Red loudspeakers are sounding through every home
Publisher: Beijing renmin meishu chubanshe(北京人民美术出版社)
Notes: Loudspeakers are attached to the village's PA system, so this family can enjoy the political songs, slogans and lectures broadcasted all day long. Note the 'Mao shrine' inside: Mao's portrait with slogans on each side and Little Red Books underneath.
